# Steam power

The most popular and practical is the following blueprint:

![Basic steam power](../../images/PowerProduction/SteamPower.01.png)

```blueprint

```

Here are 34 `Boilers` that consumes whole `Transport belt` of coal, 68 `Steam engine` produce 61.2MW energy, 2 `Offshore pumps` have to be attached to boilers.

The following blueprint is useful for produce electricity from `Solid fuel`. Here are 40 boilser, that is maximum for 2 offshore pumps:

```blueprint

```
